title: The Complete Brothers Grimm Fairy Tales
description: This illustrated volume contains every published story by the Brothers Grimm, from well-known classics like "Cinderella" to lesser-known tales such as "The Bright Sun Brings on the Day". Other enchanting fairy tales • "The Frog Prince"• "Hansel and Gretel"• "Snow-White and Red-Rose"• "Rapunzel"• "Little Red Riding Hood"• "Rumpelstiltskin"
author: Jacob Grimm
